name: Koena Mitra
content:
Koena Mitra (born 7 January 1985)[1] is an Indian actress and model who appears in Bollywood films. She mostly known for her item no songs and movie Apna Sapna Money Money.
 Mitra was born in Kolkata, India, in a Bengali family.[1] She attended Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute. She has a major in psychology.[1] She is trained in western dance forms, basketball, swimming and tennis.
 Mitra started her modelling career while she was still in school.[1] In 2001, she won the beauty pageant Gladrags Mega Model India 2001. She later became one of the top-12 semifinalists of Miss Intercontinental Pageant in Germany out of 84 countries. Over the years, Mitra has done commercials for Mirinda, Durex, Always, Playboy
 She featured in a few music videos like Stereo Nation’s Ishq, Aaj Ki Raat, Akh Teri, Channo by Jasbir Jassi. Her first film appearance was the special appearance in Ram Gopal Varma's Road. In 2004, her biggest success came with Sanjay Dutt in Musafir that catapulted her into the league of the girls-to-watch-out for , in the song O Saki Saki , the movie was produced by Sanjay Gupta and Sanjay Dutt .[2]
 In 2005, she appeared in the film Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena playing the role of Natasha.[3] In the same year she acted her next film Insan In 2006, she appeared in the film Apna Sapna Money Money acting as Julie. In 2007, she appeared in films Om Shanti Om and Heyy Babyy as herself.
 In 2009, she participated in Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa in the 3rd season. In 2019 Mitra was a celebrity contestant in Colors TV's reality show, Bigg Boss 13.[4][5] She entered the house on 29 September 2019 and was evicted on 13 October.[6]
 In 2019, Mitra was among the top 10 most searched personalities in India on Google.[7]

Koena Mitra (born 7 January 1985)[1] is an Indian actress and model who appears in Bollywood films. She mostly known for her item no songs and movie Apna Sapna Money Money.

Contents

1 Early life
2 Career

2.1 Modelling
2.2 Acting
2.3 Reality Television


3 In the media
4 Filmography
5 Television
6 References
7 External links


Early life[edit]
Mitra was born in Kolkata, India, in a Bengali family.[1] She attended Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute. She has a major in psychology.[1] She is trained in western dance forms, basketball, swimming and tennis.

Career[edit]
 Mitra in 2006
Modelling[edit]
Mitra started her modelling career while she was still in school.[1] In 2001, she won the beauty pageant Gladrags Mega Model India 2001. She later became one of the top-12 semifinalists of Miss Intercontinental Pageant in Germany out of 84 countries. Over the years, Mitra has done commercials for Mirinda, Durex, Always, Playboy

Acting[edit]
She featured in a few music videos like Stereo Nation’s Ishq, Aaj Ki Raat, Akh Teri, Channo by Jasbir Jassi. Her first film appearance was the special appearance in Ram Gopal Varma's Road. In 2004, her biggest success came with Sanjay Dutt in Musafir that catapulted her into the league of the girls-to-watch-out for , in the song O Saki Saki , the movie was produced by Sanjay Gupta and Sanjay Dutt .[2]
In 2005, she appeared in the film Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena playing the role of Natasha.[3] In the same year she acted her next film Insan In 2006, she appeared in the film Apna Sapna Money Money acting as Julie. In 2007, she appeared in films Om Shanti Om and Heyy Babyy as herself.

Reality Television[edit]
In 2009, she participated in Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa in the 3rd season. In 2019 Mitra was a celebrity contestant in Colors TV's reality show, Bigg Boss 13.[4][5] She entered the house on 29 September 2019 and was evicted on 13 October.[6]

In the media[edit]
In 2019, Mitra was among the top 10 most searched personalities in India on Google.[7]
